org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.agent.mover

Class GippsSteering

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.agent.mover.GippsSteering

  • public class GippsSteering
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of Gipps steering behavior explained in the following paper :
    See Also:
    Gipps' Steering Behavior

    • Field Detail

      • teta

        public static double teta

    • Constructor Detail

      • GippsSteering

        public GippsSteering(double maxAcceleration,
                     double maxBraking)
        Build a Gipps model instance, from the specified vehicle constants.
        Parameters:
        maxAcceleration - maximum vehicle acceleration (m/s-2)
        maxBraking - maximum vehicle braking, negative (m/s-2)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified acceleration is negative, the specified braking is positive.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed(double followerSpeed,
                       double whishedFollowerSpeed,
                       double leaderSpeed,
                       double leaderSize,
                       double maxLeaderBraking,
                       double distanceBetweenAgents)
        Compute speed with steering behavior by using minimum between acceleration and braking
        Parameters:
        followerSpeed - speed of vehicle n at time t
        whishedFollowerSpeed - speed at which the driver of vehicle n wishes to travel
        leaderSpeed - speed of vehicle n-1 at time t
        leaderSize - effective size of vehicle n-1
        maxLeaderBraking - assumption of most severe braking of vehicle n-1
        distanceBetweenAgents - distance between agents along the road, from front to front
        Returns:
        new speed for vehicle n

      • getSpeedWithoutLeader

        public double getSpeedWithoutLeader(double currentSpeed,
                                    double wishedSpeed)
        Compute speed without considering any leader.
        Parameters:
        currentSpeed - speed of vehicle n at time t
        wishedSpeed - speed at which the driver of vehicle n wishes to travel
        Returns:
        new speed for vehicle n

      • getMaxAcceleration

        public double getMaxAcceleration()
        Maximum vehicle acceleration, in m/s-2
        Returns:
        maximum vehicle acceleration (m/s-2)

      • getMaxBraking

        public double getMaxBraking()
        Maximum vehicle braking, negative, in m/s-2
        Returns:
        maximum vehicle braking (m/s-2)
